name: Explosion Bowl
description:
Arrow keys to move,

Space to drop bombs,

esc key to exit.

Right now, the game is not to a point where you can play a finished level. I believe there is enough to play around with and get a feel for what I have been looking to do.

Things not added to game, looking to add:

More diverse weapons/ loadout system.

Enemy AI

Map goals and events

Scorekeeping for kills vs deaths

Leveling within maps
